TO CHEAT: open up the file: hitmancontracts.ini; and insert ''EnableCheats 1'' and save. Afterwards, start the game and the cheats during any mission. Also note that Case Sensitivity does matter.

how do i replace cd1 to cd2 ?????plz help

@mp10k

When it tells you to tell you put in cd2 go to the directory of where cd2 is, go in the tab where it says c2 and right click it. Press "copy address"

and paste it in where it says enter cd 2.

Example v

C:\Users\Users name here\Downloads\[TorrThem] Hitman 3 - Contracts (2004)\cd2

ok guys so i downloaded this torrent. and installed everything perfectly, applied the patch and crack. then started the game. maxed out the graphics and resolution and the game crashed. seems that the game shouldn't be tweaked it already looks ok/good. so i couldnt start the game just like the last person says. so i went into c:/program files x86/eidos/hitman contracts and in this folder is a EXE restore defaults. ran this exe and like it says restores the defaults. so i ran the game perfectly after. i have turned up the graphics in the first graphics screen but left the second alone. and im running a qosmio x505 8102x with windows 7 home premium. the game so far looks awesome. i actually owned this game back in 04 but lost it.and still have my save files. so i have all the levels unlocked. hell yea!! i love hitman and very thankful to all4tpb for uploading this game. its so easy to install and no problem. you can even take the install on a usb drive,since its less then a gig.and put on another friends computer. A+++ TORRENT. thanks again.
